title: Nightmarism: Poems
description: Journey through imagistic nightmarescapes of tormented lovers, dark secrets, murderous leaders, peasant-eating spiders, apathetic gods, a spaceship bound for Hell, and more. This is American nightmare poetry at its best in the contemporary tradition of Galway Kinnell, Albert Goldbarth, Marvin Bell, and rock 'n' roll. NIGHTMARISM is a selection of some of Pushcart Prize nominated poet Robert C.J. Graves' best work to date.
author: Robert C.J. Graves
